info.name: Scenario: Buying a specific number by NPA/NXX prefix
info.description:
To do this you need to select a NPA/NXX group by country (US) and region name (New York) as well as by NPA/NXX value (212461). You also need to select a Stock keeping unit (sku_id) which indicates DID number price and one of its available capacity options (usually DID price + 0 channels/2 channels).


> ### Attention
> 
> Requests should be run one-by-one on real environment for real values usage

#### Environment variables

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `host` | API host |
| `apiKey` | Your DIDWW API key |

#### Collection variables

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `country.id` | US country id |
| `region.id` | New York region id |
| `nanpa_prefix.id` | The id if NPA/NXX prefix group, having NPA: 212, NXX: 461 |
| `stock_keeping_unit.id` | ID of Stock keeping unit with 2 channels included |

exec: // set collection variable value if test successful
// proceed next request in Collection Runner if test successful

query.description:
`string` - Filters by country iso field. 

* **Allow blank** - *Yes*. 
* **Allow array** - *Yes*.

query.description:
Comma-separated values of include parameter.
The response will include a top-level object `relationships` with associated data under the appropriate resource key.
Details in [Inclusion of Related Resources](#inclusion-of-related-resources) Article.

**Allowed values:**

country - [Country Object](#country-object)

`string` - Filters by region id field. 

* **Allow blank** - *No*. 
* **Allow array** - *Yes*.

`string` - Filters by region name field. Case insensitive. 

* **Allow blank** - *Yes*. 
* **Allow array** - *Yes*.

`string` - Filters by a country.id field. 

* **Allow blank** - *Yes*. 
* **Allow array** - *Yes*.

Used for sorting the fields returned by the request, with a comma `,` separating the included fields.
Details in [Sorting](#sorting) Article.

**name** - Region `name` field.
***

query.description:
Comma-separated values of include parameter.
The response will include a top-level object `relationships` with associated data under the appropriate resource key.
Details in [Inclusion of Related Resources](#inclusion-of-related-resources) Article.

**Allowed values:**

country - [Country Object](#country-object)
***
region - [Region Object](#region-object)
***

`string` - Filters by NANPA Prefixes `id` field. 
* **Allow blank** - *No*. 
* **Allow array** - *Yes*.

`string` - Filters by NANPA Prefixes `npa` field. 
* **Allow blank** - *Yes*. 
* **Allow array** - *Yes*.

`string` - Filters by NANPA Prefixes `nxx` field. 
* **Allow blank** - *Yes*. 
* **Allow array** - *Yes*.

`string` - Filters by NANPA Prefixes `npa` / `nxx` fields. 
* **Allow blank** - *No*. 
* **Allow array** - *No*.

`string` - Filters by NANPA Prefixes `country.id` field. 
* **Allow blank** - *Yes*. 
* **Allow array** - *Yes*.

`string` - Filters by NANPA Prefixes `region.id` field. 
* **Allow blank** - *Yes*. 
* **Allow array** - *Yes*.

`boolean` - Availability of DIDs in stock for prefix. 
* **Allow blank** - *No*. 
* **Allow array** - *No*.

`string` - Availability of DIDs in stock with features for prefix. Can be one/several/all of “voice_in”, “voice_out”, “t38”, “sms_in”, “sms_out”. example: “voice_in,sms_in”. 
* **Allow blank** - *No*. 
* **Allow array** - *Yes*.

Used for sorting the fields returned by the request, with a comma `,` separating the included fields.
Details in [Sorting](#sorting) Article.

**npa** - The `npa` field.
***
**nxx** - The `nxx` field.
***

request.description: Returns a collection of NANPA Prefixes.

query.description:
Comma-separated values of include parameter.
The response will include a top-level object `relationships` with associated data under the appropriate resource key.
Details in [Inclusion of Related Resources](#inclusion-of-related-resources) Article.

**Allowed values:**

country - [Country Object](#country-object)
***
region - [Region Object](#region-object)
***
city - [City Object](#city-object)
***
did_group_type - [DID Group Type Object](#did-group-type-object)
***
stock_keeping_units - A list of [Stock Keeping Unit Object](#stock-keeping-unit-object)
***

`string` - Filters by group id field. 

* **Allow blank** - *No*. 
* **Allow array** - *Yes*.

`string` - Filters by the city prefix field. 

* **Allow blank** - *Yes*. 
* **Allow array** - *Yes*.

`string` - Filters by the area_name field (for example London). Case insensitive 

* **Allow blank** - *Yes*. 
* **Allow array** - *Yes*.

`boolean` - Filters by the is_metered field. 

* **Allow blank** - *No*.
* **Allow array** - *No*.

`boolean` - Filters by the allow_additional_channels field. 

* **Allow blank** - *No*. 
* **Allow array** - *No*.

`boolean` - Filters by the available_dids_enabled field. 

* **Allow blank** - *No*. 
* **Allow array** - *No*.

`string` - Filters by the features field.  
Can be one/several/all of **voice_in**, **voice_out**, **t38**, **sms_in**, **sms_out** (example: “voice_in,sms_in”). 

* **Allow blank** - *No*. 
* **Allow array** - *Yes*.

`boolean` - Filters by the needs_registration field. 

* **Allow blank** - *No*. 
* **Allow array** - *No*.

`boolean` - Filters by the is_available field. 

* **Allow blank** - *No*. 
* **Allow array** - *No*.

`string` - Filters by the country.id field.

* **Allow blank** - *Yes*. 
* **Allow array** - *Yes*.

`string` - Filters by the region.id field. 

* **Allow blank** - *Yes*. 
* **Allow array** - *Yes*.

`string` - Filters by the city.id field. 

* **Allow blank** - *Yes*. 
* **Allow array** - *Yes*.

`string` - Filters by the nanpa_prefix.id field. 
* **Allow blank** - *Yes*. 
* **Allow array** - *Yes*.

`string` - Filters by the nanpa_prefix.npanxx field. 
* **Allow blank** - *Yes*. 
* **Allow array** - *Yes*.

`string` - Filters by the did_group_type.id field. 

* **Allow blank** - *Yes*. 
* **Allow array** - *Yes*.

Used for sorting the fields returned by the request, with a comma `,` separating the included fields.
Details in [Sorting](#sorting) Article.

**country.name** - Sort by the `country.name` field.
***
**did_group_type.name** - Sort by the `did_group_type.name` field.
***
**prefix** - City `prefix` field.
***
**local_prefix** - Sort by the `local_prefix` field.
***
**is_metered** - Sort by the `is_metered` field.
***
**area_name** - Sort by the `area_name` field.
***
**allow_additional_channels** - Sort by the `allow_additional_channels` field.
***

request.description: Returns a list of DID Groups, which is essentially a list of the current DIDWW coverage. DID Groups are phone numbers that share a common city or area code.

header.value: Origin, X-Requested-With, Content-Type, Accept, auth-key, x-api-key, api-key, x-api-token, x-admin-session-token, Cache-Control
GET, POST, DELETE, PUT, PATCH, OPTIONS

header.value: Origin, X-Requested-With, Content-Type, Accept, auth-key, x-api-key, api-key, x-api-token, x-admin-session-token, Cache-Control
GET, POST, DELETE, PUT, PATCH, OPTIONS

request.description: #### Request Body Scheme > `{` > > > **data** (*object, required*) `{` > > > > > **type** (*string, required*): **orders** > > > > > **attributes** (*object, required*) `{` > > > > > > > **allow_back_ordering** (*boolean, optional*) > > > > Allowing back ordering. > > > > > > > **callback_url** (*string, optional*) > > > > The HTTP or HTTPS endpoint to where events related to order will be delivered. > > > > See [Callback details](#callback-details) for information about *callback_url*. > > > > > > > **callback_method** (*string, optional*) > > > > The HTTP Method used for order events. **POST**, **GET** are supported methods. > > > > See [Callback details](#callback-details) for information about *callback_method*. > > > > > > > **items** (*Array\[CreateOrderItem\], required*) `[` > > > > Order items array. > > > > > > > > > `{` > > > > > > > > > > > **type** (*string*): **did_order_items** > > > > > > > > > > > **attributes** (*object*) `{` > > > > > > > > > > > > > **sku_id** (*string, required*) > > > > > > > [Stock Keeping Unit Object](#stock-keeping-unit-object) ID. Should be used with one of optional parameters `qty`, `available_did_id` or `did_reservation_id`. > > > > > > > > > > > > > **qty** (*integer, required*) > > > > > > > Quantity if ordering items. Should NOT be used with optional parameters `available_did_id` or `did_reservation_id`. > > > > > > > > > > > > > **billing_cycles_count** (*integer, optional*) > > > > > > > The number of Billing Cycles that this DID Number will renew until expiration. > > > > > > > `null` value means that DID will be renewed infinitely. `0` value means that DID will not be renewed. `2` value means that DID will be renewed only twice. After each renew value will be decreased by 1 if it is set. Value can be set from `0` to `999`. > > > > > > > By default value is `null`. > > > > > > > > > > > > > **did_reservation_id** (*string, optional*) > > > > > > > Specific [DID Reservation Object](#did-reservation-object) ID. > > > > > > > > > > > > > **available_did_id** (*string, optional*) > > > > > > > Specific [Available DID Object](#available-did-object) ID. > > > > > > > > > > > > > **prorate_days_qty** (*integer, optional*) > > > > > > > Amount of service time (days). > > > > > > > > > > > > > **nanpa_prefix_id** (*string, optional*) > > > > > > > The ID of [NPA NXX Group](#nanpa-prefix-object). > > > > > > > > > > > > `}` > > > > > > > > > > `}` > > > > > > > > `]` > > > > > > `}` > > > > `}` > > `}` > **Attention** > > Please note that `prorate_days_qty` attribute will be ignored if Prorate billing is not enabled per your DIDWW account. To enabled this billing option please contact Sales department via email [sales@didww.com](sales@didww.com) #### Request Body Example: ###### Allowing back ordering ``` json { "data": { "type": "orders", "attributes": { "allow_back_ordering": true, "items": [ { "type": "did_order_items", "attributes": { "qty": 15, "sku_id": "a78bb6d8-b05e-4e12-afe6-ad84ac979088" } } ] } } } ``` ``` json { "data": { "type": "orders", "attributes": { "allow_back_ordering": true, "items": [ { "type": "did_order_items", "attributes": { "qty": 15, "sku_id": "b6d9d793-578d-42d3-bc33-73dd8155e615" } } ] } } } ``` * * * ###### Specific Available DID ``` json { "data": { "type": "orders", "attributes": { "allow_back_ordering": false, "items": [ { "type": "did_order_items", "attributes": { "available_did_id": "7f44285d-20ef-4773-953f-ba012adafed3", "sku_id": "b6d9d793-578d-42d3-bc33-73dd8155e615" } } ] } } } ``` * * * ###### Specific DID Reservation ``` json { "data": { "type": "orders", "attributes": { "allow_back_ordering": false, "items": [ { "type": "did_order_items", "attributes": { "did_reservation_id": "2a1d98d2-eafd-4332-80d5-5ecd36411eb3", "sku_id": "b6d9d793-578d-42d3-bc33-73dd8155e615" } } ] } } } ```

exec: // for API version header. If customer has greater API version, then header is ignored
// minimum required version of API3 for current scenario
// prevent execution of next request in Collection Runner unless next request is defined.
pm.test("apiKey is set in Environment variables", ()=>{
pm.expect(apiKey, "apiKey is absent in Environment Variables").not.undefined
pm.expect(apiKey, "apiKey value is empty in Environment Variables").not.empty
pm.expect(apiKey, "apiKey value is not redefined in Environment Variables").not.eq("yourDidwwApiKey")
